properties.description: Number of rows difference to load the next/previous page
properties.name: _infiniteScrollAdvance

properties.description: Whether the grid will manage the rows amount depending on the available space
properties.name: autofit

properties.description: Pixels that will be set as the minimum width of each column
properties.name: columnMinWidth

properties.description: Defines the columns that will be shown in the grid
properties.name: columns

properties.description: Whether the user will be able to edit entry cells or not
properties.name: editable

properties.description: Defines the headers of the given columns
properties.name: headers

properties.description: This property will be transfered to the store
properties.name: idProperty

properties.description: Defines the type of the page pagination
properties.name: paginationType

properties.description: Whether the user can resize the columns or not
properties.name: resizable

properties.description: Pixels that will be set as the minimum height of each row
properties.name: rowMinHeight

properties.description: It can be a number of max rows of the page, or automatic
properties.name: String

methods.description: Creates and returns the dummies to fill the page
methods.name: _buildDummies
